newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Taiwan's CPC seeks 3,500 tns of MTBE for Oct 1-15.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan's CPC seeks 3,500 tns of MTBE for Oct 1-15.

text.p: Taiwan's state-owned Chinese Petroleum Corp (CPC) has issued a tender to buy 3,500 tonnes of methyl tertiary butyl ether (MTBE) for October 1-15 delivery, a CPC official said on Tuesday.
The cargo is to be delivered on a cost-and-freight (c-and-f) basis to Kaohsiung or Keelung at CPC's option.
The tender closes August 26 and offers would be valid August 28.
The official said CPC may consider taking one or two cargoes of 3,500 tonnes subject to the price offered.
CPC's last purchase of MTBE was at $275 per tonne on a c-and-f basis, for September 1-15 delivery.
MTBE is an additive added to gasoline to boost its octane number.
